p: Original gene expression data were deposited in Gene Expression Omnibus database (GEO) under accession number GSE138042. Raw fastq data are available in SRA archive under accession number PRJNA588725. Description of clinically relevant (age, sex, diagnosis, tumor histotype, BRAF (V600E) mutation status) and technical (RIN, date of sequencing) information is given in the Supplementary file 1. Results of RNA sequencing reads quality assay are given for mRNA in the Supplementary file 2.
